the glowing

2003-05-17

I went to the "advance dance," somewhat apprehensive that it might be a stronghold of Contra Nazism, but they messed up contra corners (and laughed about it) there too. I dunno what the mental block is with that move.

This bearded fellow in our hands four said "Well I thought you two were brother and sister, but I don't think that now." That made us laugh a bunch. People think I look like Parks, but I don't really see it.

I imagined my eyes glowing where she kissed around them.
